questions_answers.question: What is the policy effective date of this policy?
questions_answers.answer: The policy effective date for this homeowners insurance policy is May 28, 2022.
questions_answers.title: Policy Effective Date
questions_answers.policy_details: The policy is effective from May 28, 2022, and covers a period of one year, ending on May 28, 2023.

questions_answers.question: Who is the insurance company and their contact information for claims?
questions_answers.answer: The insurance company for this policy is SureChoice Underwriters Reciprocal Exchange, managed by SageSure. To process a claim, you can contact their 24/7 Claims Department directly at (800) 481-0622 or visit their website at www.MySageSure.com.
questions_answers.title: Insurance Company and Contact Information for Claims
questions_answers.text_reference: To file or track a claim, please contact SureChoice Underwriters Reciprocal Exchange 's 24/7 Claims Department directly at (800) 481-0622 or visit www.MySageSure.com for information about filing a claim online.
questions_answers.policy_details: SureChoice Underwriters Reciprocal Exchange provides the coverage, and SageSure manages the insurance policy. Claims can be filed or tracked via their 24/7 hotline or online portal.

questions_answers.question: Who is the agent or broker listed in this policy?
questions_answers.answer: The agent or broker listed in this policy is Helix Insurance Group, located at 101 Tiki Drive, Suite 202, Galveston, TX 77554. You can contact them at (409) 877-1687 or via email at service@helixinsurancegroup.com.
questions_answers.title: Agent or Broker Information
questions_answers.text_reference: Producer: Call your Insurance Representative: BRADLEY DONAHOO W30503N (409) 877-1687 HELIX INSURANCE GROUP 101 TIKI DRIVE, SUITE 202 GALVESTON, TX 77554 service@helixinsurancegroup.com
questions_answers.policy_details: Helix Insurance Group is the designated producer for this policy, serving as the intermediary between the insured and the insurer for any questions or policy management needs.
